description: Erection of hip to gable L-shaped mansard roof extension with rear dormer and juliet balcony. Installation of 1no front, 2nos side and 1no rooflight on top of flat roof. Removal of 2nos existing chimneys and increase in height of 1no existing chimney to right side elevation.
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.Reason: This is required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The development to which this permission relates shall be carried out in accordance with the materials specified on the approved plans and on the submitted application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with Policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

Prior to beneficial occupation of the development to which this permission relates, any windows or rooflights at the first floor level or above in the both side elevations shall be constructed so that no part of the framework less than 1.7m above finished floor level shall be openable. Any part below that level shall be fitted with and permanently retained in obscure glazing to a minimum of level 3 on the standard scale. Any film used to achieve the requisite obscurity level shall be non-perishable, tamper-proof, and shall be replaced immediately in the event that it ceases to result in obscurity to level 3.Reason: To ensure satisfactory living conditions for neighbouring occupiers, in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policy DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the Draft Fire Statement Form hereby approved and thereafter maintained.Reason: In the interests of Fire Safety and to ensure the safety of all building users in accordance with Policy D12 (Fire safety) of the London Plan 2021.

The void area to the north elevation and as shown on the hereby approved Proposed Loft Floor Plan ref PJ238-10-006 of the development to which this permission relates shall not be used as a balcony or seating area or other similar amenity area, and shall not be accessed except for the purpose of maintenance or in the case of emergency.Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning and to ensure satisfactory living conditions for neighbouring occupiers, in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policy DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
